part_description: Consists of two compartments, vertically stacked, with handles on the right side of each door.
internal_interaction_description: The upper compartment is typically a freezer, maintaining a colder temperature, while the lower compartment is a refrigerator, keeping food fresh. Each has shelves and bins to organize contents, with doors sealing tightly to maintain internal temperatures.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with users by storing perishable items, accessed by opening doors. Requires electrical connection for operation and fits into kitchen spaces, often alongside cabinets or counters.
